Up.Statement:
-- 商品ランキング update w2_DispSummaryAnalysis set reserved2 = counts - Floor((counts / 1.05) + 0) where (summary_kbn = 'pct_buyprice' or summary_kbn = 'pct_buyprice_pc' or summary_kbn = 'pct_buyprice_mob' or summary_kbn = 'pct_buyprice_sp') and counts <> 0 and reserved2 = 0;
-- 同梱 update w2_OrderItem set product_tax_included_flg = '1' , product_tax_rate = 5 , product_tax_round_type = 'ROUNDDOWN' , product_price_pretax = product_price where product_tax_rate = 0;
